name: elvishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is like an elf (= an imaginary being in stories, often like a small person with pointed ears): He took off his hat to reveal his almost elvishly sharp features. He was elvishly thin, but strong and nimble. Synonym
elfishlyRelated word
elvish
More examplesFewer examplesHer big, brown eyes danced elvishly.He had elvishly perfect features, with eyes the colour of sapphires. He peeped at us elvishly from behind a tree.She sat by the fountain holding a letter between her elvishly long fingers.As a child, he was elvishly mischievous and loved playing practical jokes.
